sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container class="d-flex justify-center align-center">
        <v-card class="mx-auto">
            <v-list>
                <v-list-item>
                    <v-avatar :size="56" :src="'data:image/jpeg;base64,' + seller_avatar" />
                    <v-list-item-content>
                        <v-list-item-title class="text-h5">{{ product_name }}</v-list-item-title>
                        <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ seller_name }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                </v-list-item>
            </v-list>
            <v-img class="mx-auto" aspect-ratio="16/9" :width="600" :src="'data:image/jpeg;base64,' + product_image" />

            <v-divider></v-divider>

            <v-card-text class="text-h4 text-center my-4">{{ product_desc }}</v-card-text>

            <v-card-actions class="d-flex justify-center">
                <v-btn color="primary">Open chat</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'ShowProducts',
    data: () => ({
        master_available: '',
        master_not_available: ''
    }),
    props: {
        product_name: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        seller_avatar: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        seller_name: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        product_desc: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        product_image: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        product_id: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        }
    }
}
</script>
